ai-thig5.12:1.1_0: I used to be in a sorry state.
ai-thig5.12:1.4_0: I got neither food nor clothes.
ai-thig5.12:2.2_0: and went begging from family to family.
ai-thig5.12:4.2_0: Paṭācārā gave me the going forth.
ai-thig5.12:4.4_0: she urged me on to the ultimate goal.
ai-thig5.12:5.3_0: The lady’s advice was not in vain:
ai-thig5.12:5.4_0: Master of the three knowledges, I am free of defilements.”
ai-thig5.12:7.1_0: The Book of the Fives is finished.
